identifier: Washington Post restaurant reviews three four stars|washingtonpost.com
content: Only one restaurant, Kinkead's in Georgetown, rated four stars. Compare that with New York, which has three five-star restaurants, and Los
The following review is part of The Washington Post's 2017 Fall Dining Guide Top 10 countdown. ... 3.5 stars.. Follow Dining & drinks.
